characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: On three separate turns during the battle, a Marauder Bomber equipped with hellstorm bombs can make a bombing run against a single enemy unit it moves over during one of its Movement phases. After the Marauder Bomber has moved, pick an enemy unit that it flew over, then roll 2D6 for each VEHICLE or MONSTER in the unit or a single D6 for every other model in the unit, up to a maximum of 10D6. For every roll of a 3+, the unit suffers a mortal wound.
